system.description:
Trigger: You are hit by a Status-Category attack.
Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit you, and additional Status-Category attacks that hit you also fail to hit you until your next activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. attacks failing to hit you do not activate on-miss effects.

actions.name: Crafty Shield

cost.trigger: You are hit by a Status-Category attack.
